    • Inspiration you say? Have a look at some of these examples.

    We think Slippry is a pretty customisable slider, so we've included some (slightly random) combinations of options and the function settings and CSS (if applicable) to recreate them.

    Have you customised Slippry in an awesome way? Let us know at rockets (at) booncon.com! We love to see what people do with Slippry.
